name: 0-1587 jolly bounty
notes:
**crocheted cornet in drops belle. piece is crocheted as a square from the middle and outwards. theme: christmas.**
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

drops design: pattern vs-096
yarn group b

----------------------------------------------------------


**size**:
1 square measures approx. 12 x 12 cm.

**yarn**:
drops belle from garnstudio (belongs to yarn group b)
50 g colour 24, sand
50 g colour 25, forest brown

1 cornet weighs approx. 12 g.

**crochet hook**:
drops crochet hook size 3 mm

**crochet tension**:
22 treble crochets in width and 11 rows vertically = 10 x 10 cm.
note! remember that hook size is only a suggestion. if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook. if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook.
